tool_description: Determines the complete equipment list needed for a portrait session based on location, lighting conditions, session type, and creative requirements.

location_type.description: Primary location type for the session

lighting_conditions.description: Expected lighting: natural, mixed, studio, low-light, or golden-hour

group_size.description: Number of subjects in the portrait

backup_equipment.description: Whether to include backup equipment in calculations

travel_distance.description: Distance to location in miles for transport planning

weather_conditions.description: Expected weather: sunny, cloudy, overcast, rain-risk, or windy

power_available.description: Whether AC power is available at location

error_messages: Invalid session type: Must be a recognized portrait session type
Invalid location type: Must be a valid location category
Invalid lighting conditions: Must be one of [natural, mixed, studio, low-light, golden-hour]
Invalid group size: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 50
Invalid travel distance: Must be a non-negative number
Invalid session duration: Must be between 0.5 and 12 hours
Invalid weather conditions: Must be one of [sunny, cloudy, overcast, rain-risk, windy]
usage: Specify session details including type, location, lighting, and group size. Add optional parameters for more precise equipment calculations. Returns comprehensive equipment lists organized by category.

camera_gear.description: Required cameras, lenses, and camera accessories

lighting_equipment.description: Lighting equipment including strobes, modifiers, and supports

support_equipment.description: Tripods, stands, and other support equipment

total_items.description: Total number of equipment items required

equipment_summary.description: Summary of equipment needs and transportation considerations
